author: Staff Reporter
text:
An election control room for the Coimbatore South Assembly Constituency will function round the clock at the Coimbatore Corporation, the Deputy Commissioner of which is the Returning Officer. The control room will function at the Corporation head office in Town Hall and members of the public can reach the control room officials by dialling 0422-2302323. They may reach the Returning Officer on 94437-77666, the Assistant Returning Officer – I on 94892-06001 and the Assistant Returning Officer – II on 94892-06055.

They may reach the flying squad officials on the following numbers 97918-19231, 74026-07283 or 74026-07284. Alternatively, the members of the public may reach the static surveillance team on 94436-23441, 99942-66844 or 75986-12001.
title: Election control room
